evidence.text: On February 24, 2025, Erie County’s attorney emailed a copy of a temporary injunction against enforcement of Executive Order 14151 issued by the United States District Court for the District of Maryland.

extracted.value: February 24, 2025: temporary injunction against enforcement of Executive Order 14151

evidence.text: So ORDERED by Chief Judge James E. Boasberg on March 25, 2025.

On February 24, 2025, Erie County’s attorney emailed a copy of a temporary injunction against enforcement of Executive Order 14151 issued by the United States District Court for the District of Maryland. Erie County’s attorney ... asked that Americorps "please confirm that you will take no further action against Erie County . . . unless and until this Order is lifted."

extracted.value: Until order is lifted: temporary injunction against enforcement of Executive Order 14151

evidence.text: unless and until this Order is lifted
